name: Recorded Future For Splunk SOAR
description: This app implements investigative actions to perform lookups for quick reputation information, contextual threat intelligence and external threat alerts

on_poll_alert_ruleids.description: Comma-separated list of alert rule IDs

on_poll_alert_severity.description: Severity to apply to the alert event

max_count.description: Max events to ingest for scheduled polling

first_max_count.description: Max events to ingest for scheduled polling first time

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity
Update status and/or notes for the alert specified with alert_id

alert_id.description: Alert ID specifying which alert to update

alert_note.description: Text to be added to the alert

actions.description: Get details on alerts configured and generated by Recorded Future by alert rule ID and time range

rule_id.description: Alert Rule ID to look up alert data for

timeframe.description: Time range for when rules were triggered

alert_id.description: Alert ID to use for the lookup

actions.description: Search for alert rule IDs by name

rule_search.description: Search for alert rule name and ID

actions.verbose: This action will fetch alerts for the specified rule IDs and within the specified timeframe. When limiting the number of events to ingest, it will ingest the most recent events.
